DOC.brief_summary: Users of Breezy candy will utilize the candy's abrasiveness to scrape tongue surface. The scraping action together with the release of compounds contained inside the abrasive microcapsules will result in significant reduction of oral halitosis.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Breezy Candy on Halitosis
DOC.criteria: adult healthy male female bad breath subject suffering from Diabetes subject suffering from renal disease pregnant women cigarette smokers any illness of oral cavity for the last 3 months subjects undergoing chemotherapy treatment by antibiotic treatment by antiinflammatory
